short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to learn Indic Languages on the go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Myna is an extension which enables users to learn Indian Language Vocabulary across 10+ languages on the go as they browse the web.

Get going on learning Indian Language Vocabulary in just a few steps : 

- Add the Myna Extension to your Chrome Browser.
- Activate the Myna Extension by selecting the Extension icon on
top right of the browser and navigate to the Myna Extension and
then click the switch next to the Myna Title.
- Now open any website and you would see some words
highlighted in orange. Hover over the word to learn about the
word. You can click the audio button to hear a pronunciation or
bookmark it for later.
- You can also head to options and adjust word frequency
(number of highlighted words on a page) or change the
language. Once options are selected, refresh your page to view
new words.

Updates :  (05-02-2023)
- Added Support for 10 New Languages
- Fixed Indic Word UI Alignment
